Highest recommendation for Dr. Kiruthika and his team here at Family Multi specialty and Dental Clinic.


I live 150 miles away from his dental office but that doesn't stop me from returning. Their staff is predominantly awesome, and what they do best is to create a hospitable environment to all guest. 

Clean and up to date facility also plenty of parking. Scheduling an appointment is a breeze with a very communicable receptionist team ensuring you get your reminders.

 The experience has been an absolute joy. Myself had severe crowding, an overbite and teeth were coming in in front of other teeth. I could see the difference in my teeth within the first two months. Apart from the healthy mouth and teeth benefits, having braces has helped me to improve my self confidence. I had stopped smiling with my mouth open before I got my braces on, I had stopped smiling much at all really, and within days of getting my braces on I started smiling with my mouth open again and has not stopped. 

Again, I want to thank your friendly staff for accommodating my needs and always taking good care of me.
